name: Praetorian Golem
desc:
A moving statue shaped like a warrior who will swing their sword at all who dare trespass upon the area under their guardianship. It is unclear if it is a soul or magic that powers them.

They say that legions of golems once conquered the nations that called the high sea home, and this might have been amongst their number. The great towers and palaces that now sleep beneath the waves once bore witness to the fate of those who stand in the path of the wheel of fate.

value.text: An ancient golem infused with will that uses its resilient marble body in battle. Use <color=#ffe14b>methods suited to dealing with Geo</color> to effectively defeat its defenses.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Ruined Hilt
dropMaterial.desc:
A stone hilt obtained from an ancient statue.

Its luster has long been lost to the depredations of seawater.

dropMaterial.name: Splintered Hilt
dropMaterial.desc:
A stone hilt obtained from an ancient statue.

The chips and grooves speak to the brutal battles its owner once weathered.

dropMaterial.name: Still-Smoldering Hilt
dropMaterial.desc:
A stone hilt obtained from an ancient statue.

Only the recentness of its separation from its owner may explain the as-yet unextinguished flame within.
